Query.Name: CustomSqlQuery
Query.Sql: SELECT problemdate, callphoneno, problemphoneno, cat1, cat2, cat2id, cat3, cat4, cat5, statusid, CASE WHEN cat3 = 'Улаанбаатарын дүүргүүд' THEN '47.8864' WHEN cat3 = 'Дархан-Уул' THEN '49.4489' WHEN cat3 = 'Орхон /Эрдэнэт/' THEN '49.0047' WHEN cat3 = 'Архангай' THEN '47.8971' WHEN cat3 = 'Баян-Өлгий' THEN '48.3983' WHEN cat3 = 'Баянхонгор' THEN '45.1527' WHEN cat3 = 'Говь-Алтай' THEN '45.4511' WHEN cat3 = 'Булган' THEN '48.8232' WHEN cat3 = 'Завхан' THEN '48.2388' WHEN cat3 = 'Өвөрхангай' THEN '45.7624' WHEN cat3 = 'Төв' THEN '47.2124' WHEN cat3 = 'Ховд' THEN '47.1130' WHEN cat3 = 'Увс' THEN '49.6450' WHEN cat3 = 'Хөвсгөл' THEN '50.2204' WHEN cat3 = 'Дорноговь' THEN '43.9654' WHEN cat3 = 'Сэлэнгэ' THEN '49.4527' WHEN cat3 = 'Дундговь' THEN '45.5823' WHEN cat3 = 'Өмнөговь' THEN '43.5000' WHEN cat3 = 'Сүхбаатар' THEN '46.5653' WHEN cat3 = 'Хэнтий' THEN '47.6081' WHEN cat3 = 'Говьсүмбэр' THEN '46.4763' WHEN cat3 = 'Дорнод' THEN '47.4658' ELSE NULL END AS a_lat, CASE WHEN cat3 = 'Улаанбаатарын дүүргүүд' THEN '106.9057' WHEN cat3 = 'Дархан-Уул' THEN '106.2325' WHEN cat3 = 'Орхон /Эрдэнэт/' THEN '104.3017' WHEN cat3 = 'Архангай' THEN '100.7240' WHEN cat3 = 'Баян-Өлгий' THEN '89.6626' WHEN cat3 = 'Баянхонгор' THEN '100.1074' WHEN cat3 = 'Говь-Алтай' THEN '95.8506' WHEN cat3 = 'Булган' THEN '103.5218' WHEN cat3 = 'Завхан' THEN '96.0703' WHEN cat3 = 'Өвөрхангай' THEN '103.0917' WHEN cat3 = 'Төв' THEN '106.4154' WHEN cat3 = 'Ховд' THEN '92.3111' WHEN cat3 = 'Увс' THEN '93.2737' WHEN cat3 = 'Хөвсгөл' THEN '100.3214' WHEN cat3 = 'Дорноговь' THEN '109.1773' WHEN cat3 = 'Сэлэнгэ' THEN '103.9814' WHEN cat3 = 'Дундговь' THEN '106.7644' WHEN cat3 = 'Өмнөговь' THEN '104.2861' WHEN cat3 = 'Сүхбаатар' THEN '113.5381' WHEN cat3 = 'Хэнтий' THEN '109.9373' WHEN cat3 = 'Говьсүмбэр' THEN '108.5571' WHEN cat3 = 'Дорнод' THEN '115.3927' ELSE NULL END AS a_long, CASE WHEN cat2id in (84797,19821,12326) THEN '46.8625' ELSE NULL END AS def_lat, CASE WHEN cat2id in (84797,19821,12326) THEN '103.8467' ELSE NULL END AS def_long FROM UNI_CALLCENTER.problem LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ptype.grouppkid, substr(tpath,instr(tpath,'>>',1,2) + 2,instr(tpath,'>>',1,3) - instr(tpath,'>>',1,2) - 2) cat1, substr(tpath,instr(tpath,'>>',1,3) + 2,instr(tpath,'>>',1,4) - instr(tpath,'>>',1,3) - 2) cat2, substr(tpathid,instr(tpathid,'>>',1,3) + 2,instr(tpathid,'>>',1,4) - instr(tpathid,'>>',1,3) - 2) cat2id, substr(tpath,instr(tpath,'>>',1,4) + 2,instr(tpath,'>>',1,5) - instr(tpath,'>>',1,4) - 2) cat3, substr(tpathid,instr(tpathid,'>>',1,4) + 2,instr(tpathid,'>>',1,5) - instr(tpathid,'>>',1,4) - 2) cat3id, substr(tpath,instr(tpath,'>>',1,5) + 2,instr(tpath,'>>',1,6) - instr(tpath,'>>',1,5) - 2) cat4, substr(tpath,instr(tpath,'>>',1,6) + 2,instr(tpath,'>>',1,7) - instr(tpath,'>>',1,6) - 2) cat5 FROM ( SELECT grouppkid, sys_connect_by_path(groupname,'>>') || '>>' AS tpath, sys_connect_by_path(grouppkid,'>>') || '>>' AS tpathid FROM UNI_CALLCENTER.problemtype START WITH parentpkid =-1 CONNECT BY PRIOR grouppkid = parentpkid ) ptype ) tproblemtype ON problem.grouppkid = tproblemtype.grouppkid WHERE problemdate BETWEEN add_months(sysdate,-2) AND SYSDATE AND cat2id IN ( '84797', '19821', '12326' )
